lead_paragraph: Kristin Huckshorn, deputy sports editor of The Times, and columnists Selena Roberts and Harvey Araton discuss the National Basketball Assocation's image. (Nov. 9, 2005)
snippet: Kristin Huckshorn, deputy sports editor of The Times, and columnists Selena Roberts and Harvey Araton discuss the National Basketball Assocation's image. (Nov. 9, 2005)
